function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of invasive mosquito vectors","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of diseases such as Zika virus and West Nile virus","Mitigation":"Implement mosquito control measures, eliminate breeding sites, and raise awareness of prevention methods","Technologies":"Mosquito surveillance and control systems, insecticide treatments, public health campaigns","People":"Local populations, travelers, and residents in affected areas","Owner":"Health authorities, local governments, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Spread of novel arboviruses into new areas","Impact":"Introduction of new diseases to regions with pre-existing competent mosquito vectors","Mitigation":"Enhance surveillance and monitoring, implement vector control strategies, and improve public health infrastructure","Technologies":"Arbovirus surveillance systems, vector control technologies, and diagnostic tools","People":"Local populations, healthcare providers, and public health organizations","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions, and government authorities"},{"Description":"Urban malaria transmission and adaptation of mosquito vectors","Impact":"Increased disease incidence and transmission in urban and peri-urban areas","Mitigation":"Implement mosquito control measures, improve sanitation, and promote community-based interventions","Technologies":"Malaria surveillance systems, insecticide-treated bed nets, and larval control methods","People":"Urban residents, migrant populations, and communities in peri-urban areas","Owner":"Health agencies, local governments, and non-governmental organizations"}]}
